quote: Sometimes the best way to help yourself is to help someone else
author: Iroh

quote: This tea is nothing more than hot leaf juice!
author: Iroh

quote: This guy is too good he shoots fire from his brain
author: Sokka

quote: Pain tethers me to the world
author: Finch

quote: Intentions can be a fickle business.
author: Finch

quote: I missed on purpose, jackass.
author: Shaw

quote: Never send a human to do a machine's job.
author: Agent Smith

quote: Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn.
author: Rhett Butler

quote: Dodge this.
author: Trinity

quote: Stop trying to hit me and hit me.
author: Morpheus

quote: Do you think that's air you're breathing now?
author: Morpheus

quote: We're two different people. We can't have the same left.
author: Charlie

quote: You think I wouldn't know if the guy I'm dating is retarded?
author: Dee

quote: You gotta pay the troll toll, if you wanna get into that boy's soul.
author: Frank

quote: Storm comin', hatchet comin'!
author: Charlie

quote: I'm not fat. I'm cultivating mass.
author: Mac

quote: Cat in the wall, eh?! Okay, now you're talking my language.
author: Charlie

quote: Oh, shit. Look at that door, dude. See that door right there? The one marked 'pirate?' You think a pirate lives in there?
author: Charlie

quote: Fight Milk! The first alcoholic dairy based protein drink for bodyguards!
author: Mac

quote: Dayman, fighter of the Nightman, champion of the sun, you're a master of karate and friendship for everyone!
author: Dennis and Charlie

quote: See, I've always got an A, B and C strike plan to get us out of any potentially life-threatening situation.
author: Mac

quote: If you're in my room, you're always being filmed.
author: Dennis

quote: I'm not gonna be buried in a grave. When I'm dead, just throw me in the trash.
author: Frank

quote: I looked for an 'I'm-sorry-I-got-you-shot' card, but they were all out.
author: Joss Carter

quote: If you really need a mystery, I recommend the human heart.
author: Harold Finch

quote: The world is a dangerous place, Elliott, not because of those who do evil, but because of those who look on and do nothing.
author: Mr. Robot

quote: Did you see that ludicrous display last night?
author: Moss

quote: The Elders of the Internet know who I am?!
author: Jen

quote: They'll beg you and they'll flatter you for the secret, but as soon as you give it up... you'll be nothing to them
author: Alfred Borden

source: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
quote: They have neither the time, the training, nor the inclination for strategic thought. I can no longer sit back and allow Communist infiltration, Communist indoctrination, Communist subversion and the international Communist conspiracy to sap and impurify all of our precious bodily fluids.
author: Jack D. Ripper

quote: When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. There is no middle ground.
author: Cersei Lannister

quote: The Love Formula: Add up the number of times you think about the lady each day. Subtract from the total the number of times you think about yourself each day.If the remainder is more lady, and less yourself, then it's love.
author: Dr. Harry Wolper

quote: If I stop drinking all at once, I'm afraid the cumulative hangover will kill me.
Hey, proposition: first person to untie me—guy or gal—I will let him or her give me a handy. Come on, let's share the milk of human kindness!
Oh, I'm sorry. I guess I skipped the Emily Post chapter on how to introduce your mother to a hooker.
He's not coming back from that. That chick was, like, the Pele of anal.
I'm not saying I invented the turtleneck, but I was the first person to realize its potential as a tactical garment. The tactical turtleneck! The … tactleneck.
I do fear death. I fear dying in here while my city burns. And there's no one there to save it.
author: Bruce Wayne

quote: Have you tried turning it off and on again?
author: Roy

quote: Tears aren't a woman's only weapon. The best one's between your legs.
author: Cersei Lannister

quote: Never forget what you are, the rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor and it can never be used to hurt you.
author: Tyrion Lannister

quote: You know nothing, Jon Snow.
author: Ygritte

quote: Winter is coming.
author: The Starks

quote: Hodor.
author: Hodor

quote: Any man who must say "I am the king" is no true king.
author: Tyrion Lannister

quote: A Lannister always pays his debts.
author: Tyrion Lannister

quote: They're just robots, Morty! It's OK to shoot them! They're robots!
author: Rick Sanchez

quote: Suprise, motherfucker!!
author: Doakes

quote: Shut up, cunt!!
author: The trinity killer

quote: You met me at a very strange time in my life.
I will look for you, I will find you, and I will kill you.
author: Bryan Mills

quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.
author: Harry Hart

quote: You are wrong if you think joy emanates only or principally from human relationships. God has placed it all around us. It is in everything and anything we might experience. We just have to have the courage to turn against our habitual lifestyle and engage in unconventional living.
author: Jon Krakauer

quote: Just because someone stumbles and loses their path, doesn't mean they're lost forever.
author: Charles Xavier/Professor X

quote: Jack! Come back! Come back! Come back!.
author: Rose

quote: They're all dead. Everybody's dead, Dave.
author: Holly

quote: Hello fellow American. This you should vote me. I leave power. Good. Thank you, thank you.
author: Dennis

quote: I'm a-- full-on rapist, you know? Uh, Africans, dyslexics, children, that sorta thing.
author: Charlie

quote: If I stop drinking all at once, I'm afraid the cumulative hangover will kill me.
author: Sterling Archer

quote: Hey, proposition: first person to untie me—guy or gal—I will let him or her give me a handy. Come on, let's share the milk of human kindness!
author: Sterling Archer

quote: He's not coming back from that. That chick was, like, the Pele of anal.
author: Sterling Archer

quote: I'm not saying I invented the turtleneck, but I was the first person to realize its potential as a tactical garment. The tactical turtleneck! The … tactleneck.
author: Sterling Archer

quote: I'm pretty sure there's a lot more to life than being really, really good looking. And I plan on finding out what that is.
author: Derek Zoolander

quote: You can't play God without being acquainted with the devil.
author: Dr. Robert Ford

quote: Oh, screw beautiful. I'm brilliant. If you want to appease me, compliment my brain!
author: Christina Yang

quote: Ah yes, I was wondering what would break first. Your spirit, or your body?
author: Bane

quote: I'll be taking these Huggies and-uh-whatever cash ya got.
author: H.I. McDonnough

quote: Aw, it ain't armed robbery if the gun ain't loaded.
author: H.I. McDonnough

quote: You see this watch? That watch cost more than your car.
author: Blake

quote: Why So Serious?
author: Joker

quote: You either die a hero or live long enough to see yourself become the villian.
author: Harvey Dent

quote: Put that coffee down! Coffee is for closers only.
author: Blake

quote: Mr. Stark, I don't feel so good
author: Peter Parker/Spiderman

quote: I AM the League of Shadows, and I'm here to fulfill Ra's al Ghul's destiny!
author: Bane

quote: Get ready to fight
author: Stan Lee

quote: Calm down, Doctor! Now's not the time for fear. That comes later.
author: Bane

quote: Love means never having to say you're sorry.
author: Erich Segal

quote: These violent delights have violent ends.
author: Dolores Abernathy

quote: I'm sorry, but your opinion means very little to me
author: Rick Sanchez

quote: Another day another Doug
author: Korg

quote: Bring me Thanos!
author: Thor

quote: The one thing that doesn't abide by majority rule is a person's conscience.
author: Atticus Finch

quote: Just remember, the sweet is never as sweet without the sour.
author: Brian

quote: What can you give the world besides an iPhone charger?
author: Alexander

quote: You gonna have to excuse my friend
author: Jordan

quote: Ladies and Gentlemen take my advice, pull do your pants and slide on the ice
author: Dr. Sidney Friedman

quote: I do one thing at a time, I do it very well. And then, I move on
author: Dr. Charles Emmerson-Winchester III

quote: We each owe a death - there are no exceptions - but, oh God, sometimes the Green Mile seems so long
author: Paul Edgecomb

quote: There wolf; there castle
author: Igor

quote: Hold the newsreader's nose squarely, waiter, or friendly milk will countermand my trousers
author: Stephen Fry

quote: Run, Forrest, run!
author: Genny Curran

quote: We create our own demons
author: Tony Stark

quote: I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.
author: Don Corleone

quote: Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies.
author: Andy Dufresne

quote: Today, at the edge of our hope, at the end of our time, we have chosen not only to believe in ourselves, but in each other. Today we face the monsters that are at our door. Today, we take the fight to them. Today we are canceling the apocalypse!
author: Stacker Pentecost

quote: We have a hulk!
author: Tony Stark

quote: I say the whole world must learn of our peaceful ways... by force!
author: Bender

quote: Never trust anyone too much, remember the devil was once an angel.
author: Kaneki Ken

source: Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back
quote: No. Try not. Do… or do not. There is no try.
author: Yoda

quote: They may take our lives, but they'll never take our freedom!
author: William Wallace

quote: The eyes, Chico. They never lie
author: Tony Montana

quote: Revenge is never a straight line. It's a forest. And like a forest, it's easy to lose your way...to get lost...to forget where you came in.
author: Hattori Hanzo

quote: Gentlemen, you can't fight in here! This is the war room!
author: President Merkin Muffley

quote: If you do not like your destination, do not accept. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: If you have no reason to be alive, it is the same as being dead.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: When a man learns to love, he has to bear the risk of hatred.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: I'm not locked in here with you. You're locked in here with me!
author: Rorschach

quote: I Love You 3000
author: Morgan

quote: People who talk in metaphors oughta shampoo my crotch.
author: Melvin Udall

quote: There is no advantage to living life on the run.
author: Shikamaru Nara

quote: Decide to be fine until the end of the week. Make yourself smile, because you're alive and that's your job. Then do it again the next week.
author: Frank

quote: Scissors cuts paper, paper covers rock, rock crushes lizard, lizard poisons Spock, Spock smashes scissors, scissors decapitates lizard, lizard eats paper, paper disproves Spock, Spock vaporizes rock, and as it always has, rock crushes scissors.
author: Sheldon

quote: A morte é como o vento, está sempre ao meu lado.
author: Yasuo

quote: Wubba lubba dub dub!
author: Rick

source: Star Wars. The Empire Strikes Back
quote: No, I am your father
author: Darth Vader

quote: yabadabadoo!
author: Fred Flintstone

quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure.
author: Timo Cruz

quote: The hardest choices require the strongest wills.
author: Thanos

quote: Every lie we tell incurs a debt to the truth. Sooner or later that debt is paid.
author: Valery Legasov

quote: People hurt the ones they love. That's how it is all around the world
author: John Coffey

quote: Is that what God does? He helps? Tell me, why didn't God help my innocent friend who died for no reason while the guilty roam free? Okay, fine. Forget the one-offs. How about the countless wars declared in his name? Okay, fine. Let's skip the random, meaningless murder for a second, shall we? How about the racist, sexist, phobia soup we've all been drowning in because of him? And I'm not just talking about Jesus. I'm talking about all organized religion... exclusive groups created to manage control, a dealer getting people hooked on the drug of hope, his followers nothing but addicts who want their hit of bullshit to keep their... their dopamine of ignorance, addicts afraid to believe the truth...that there is no order, there's no power, that all religions are just metastasizing mind worms meant to divide us so it's easier to rule us by the charlatans that want to run us. All we are to them are paying fanboys of their poorly written sci-fi franchise. If I don't listen to my imaginary friend, why the f... should I listen to yours? People think their worship's some key to happiness. That's just how he owns you. Even I'm not crazy enough to believe that distortion of reality. So f... God. He's not a good enough scapegoat for me.
author: Elliot Alderson

quote: People don't wanna follow an idea, they wanna follow a leader.
author: Jared

source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
quote: We've all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on...that's who we really are.
author: Sirius Black

source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
quote: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
author: Sirius Black

quote: One often meets his destiny on the road he takes to avoid it.
author: Master Oogway

quote: People can't do somethin' themselves, they wanna tell you you can't do it. If you want somethin', go get it. Period.
author: Chris Gardner (Will Smith)

quote: That rug really tied the room together, did it not?
author: The Dude (Jeff Bridges)

quote: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.
author: Michael Corleone

quote: May the Force be with you.
author: Han Solo

quote: Loyalty, Honor, A willing heart, i can ask no more than that.
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: “Dread it, run from it, destiny arrives all the same..
author: Thanos

quote: A million dollars isn't cool. You know what's cool? A billion dollars..
author: Ben Mezrich

quote: The film tells about the "cruel games" of prisoners and the important role of the administration, which controls them using a denunciation system.
author: Igor Gostev

quote: What a mystery this world, one day you love them and the next day you want to kill them a thousand times over.
author: Blue Bandit

quote: No man or woman can live another's fate.
author: Viviane

quote: All living things can travel through time. It's simple, really. Just wait a moment, and then another, and another. Do this often enough and you will have arrived at tomorrow. Enough tomorrows and you will be dead, adrift without power or patience. At the very end of time, you will ask yourself, "Where am I right now, and what have I done?" You will have grown old. You will have hoped, and you will have let go of hope. You will have tried, and you will have failed. Shaped by time and you are that you are not meant nor wish to be and you may be left with someone you loved and all the horrible things you've done for them until finally you will lose the very last thing you have left, yourself.
author: Katarina Jones

quote: We're all going to die. The only question is how.
author: Bodhi

quote: The man that pushes the boundaries tends to break.
author: Bodhi

quote: Nobody exists on purpose. Nobody belongs anywhere. Everybody's gonna die. Come watch TV.
author: Morty Smith

quote: Life is effort and I'll stop when I die!
author: Jerry Smith

quote: Oh ho, you're lucky a priest is taking me into the woods!
author: Frank Murphy

quote: I am not slurring my words, I'm talking in cursive.
author: Sterling Archer

quote: Karate? The dane cook of martial arts.
author: Sterling Archer

quote: Just remember, every time you look up at the moon, I, too, will be looking at a moon. Not the same moon, obviously, That's impossible.
author: Andy Dwyer

quote: Treat yo self.
author: Donna Meagle and Tom Haverford

quote: Can we have ONE conversation about feminism where MEN get to be in charge?
author: Kip Bunthart

quote: There's only one thing I hate more than lying: skim milk. Which is water that's lying about being milk.
author: Ron Swanson

quote: I know you can read my thoughts, boy: meow, meow, meow, meow, meow...
author: Homer

quote: Worst. Episode. Ever
author: Comic Book Guy

quote: Bart, I don't want to alarm you, but there may be a boogie man or boogie men in the house!
author: Homer

quote: You don't win friends with salad.
author: Homer

quote: I'm normally not a praying man, but if you're up there, please save me, Superman.
author: Homer

quote: To alcohol! The cause of, and solution to, all of life's problems!
author: Homer

quote: Don't blame me, I voted for Kodos.
author: Homer

quote: Must kill Moe, weee! Must kill Moe, weee!
author: Homer

quote: It won't last. Brothers and sisters are natural enemies, like English men and Scots. Or Wales men and Scots. Or Japanese and Scots. Or Scots and other Scots. Damn Scots! They ruined Scotland!
author: Willie

quote: Well, he's got all the money in the world, but there's one thing he can't buy: a dinosaur.
author: Homer

quote: Your potato? You can't, like, own a potato, man. It's one of Mother Earth's creatures.
author: Homer

quote: On a scale of one to ten, how would your rank your pain?
author: Jordan Roberts , Robert L. Baird, Dan Gerson

quote: The world is full of disappointments, and sometimes people let you down. You can't just run away.
author: Amy Sherman-Palladino

quote: Life isn't fair. It's hard and cruel. You have to pick your friends as if there's a war going on.
author: Amy Sherman-Palladino

quote: Just because there is a door does not mean you use it. A door does not represent infinite possibilities.
author: Amy Sherman-Palladino

quote: Every man dies, but not every man really lives
author: William Wallace

quote: Great men are not born great, they grow great
author: Mario Puzo

quote: Oh? You're approaching me?
author: Dio Brando

source: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
quote: Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the ones we miss.
author: Benjamin Button

quote: You can fly even higher.
author: Tobio Kageyama

quote: If you believe that there's a hell, I don't know if you're into that, but we're already pretty much going there, right? But I'm not gonna lie down until I get there
author: Walter White

source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, when one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: Get Busy Living, Or Get Busy Dying.
author: Andy Dufresne

quote: There's Not A Day Goes By I Don't Feel Regret.
author: Ellis Boyd Redding

quote: I Have To Remind Myself That Some Birds Aren't Meant To Be Caged.
author: Ellis Boyd Redding

quote: I didn't choose the skuxx life, the skuxx life chose me.
author: Ricky Baker

quote: Shit just got real! Back up, homies, and let go of my uncle!
author: Ricky Baker

quote: It was a relaxing song... and a relaxing sausage.
author: Ricky Baker

quote: The most dangerous man in the world is the one who doesn't know what he doesn't know.
author: Philip Banks (Uncle Phill)

quote: What's occuring?
author: Nessa

quote: If you can't love yourself, how in the hell are you gonna love somebody else!
author: RuPaul

quote: I May Be An Idiot, But There's One Thing I'm Not Sir, And That Is An Idiot.
author: Peter Griffin

quote: Machines can never think as humans do but just because something thinks differently from you, does it mean it's not thinking?
author: Alan Turing

quote: Was I God? No. Because God didn't win the war. We did.
author: Alan Turing

quote: Are you paying attention?
author: Alan Turing

quote: I know it's not ordinary. But who ever loved ordinary?
author: Joan Clarke

quote: Just keep swimming
author: Dory

quote: The film deals with the life of the Nobel Prize-winning Soviet scientist Lev Landau.
author: Ilya Khrzhanovsky

quote: I am running away from my responsibilities. And it feels good.
author: Michael Scott

quote: That's what life is about: People come and go.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: Age is just a number, not a state of mind or a reason for any type of particular behaviour.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: I've learned that home isn't a place, it's a feeling.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: We Didn't Choose This Life, We're Just Living In It.
author: Five

quote: We're All Looking For Happy.
author: The Handler

quote: Cows don’t get married.
author: Janine

quote: Love is patient love is kind.
author: Eden

quote: I don’t need oranges. I need to scream. I need to grab the nearest machine gun.
author: June

quote: Praised be, bitch.
author: Moira

quote: No, you clearly don't know who you're talking to, so let me clue you in. I am not in danger, Skyler. I am the danger! A guy opens his door and gets shot and you think that of me? No. I am the one who knocks!
author: Walter White

quote: I don’t trust people. Especially the ones who ended up here.
author: Gi-hun

quote: It took me five tries.
author: old lady

quote: Hope. It is the quintessential human delusion, simultaneously the source of your greatest strength and your greatest weakness.
author: The Architect

quote: It is remarkable how similar the pattern of love is to the pattern of insanity.
author: Merovingian

quote: If you were waiting for the opportune moment, that was it.
author: Captain Jack Sparrow

quote: Everyone is a monster to someone. Since you are so convinced that I am yours. I will be it.
author: Captain Flint

quote: Silenzio Bruno!
author: Luca & Alberto

quote: It's the oldest question of all, George. Who can spy on the spies?
author: Oliver Lacon

quote: This is our leap of faith.
author: Andre Layton

quote: Men would sooner put the realm to the torch than see a woman ascend the Iron Throne.
author: Princess Rhaenys Velaryon

quote: Me, Grimlock, want to munch metal!
author: Grimlock

quote: I’ve been involved in a number of cults, both as a leader and a follower. You have more fun as a follower. But you make more money as a leader.
author: Creed Bratton

quote: The spice must flow.
author: Guild Navigator

quote: He who controls the spice, controls the universe.
author: Baron Vladimir Harkonnen

quote: A great man doesn't seek to lead. He's called to it. And he answers.
author: Duke Leto Atreides

quote: Lead them to paradise.
author: Paul Atreides

quote: This world is beyond cruelty.
author: Paul Atreides

quote: I will love you as long as I breathe.
author: Paul Atreides

quote: You've been fighting the Harkonnens for decades. My family's been fighting them for centuries.
author: Paul Atreides

quote: I'm pointing the WAY!
author: Paul Atreides

quote: I am Paul Muad'Dib Atreides, Duke of Arrakis. The Hand of God be my witness, I am the Voice from the Outer World! I will lead you to PARADISE!
author: Paul Atreides

quote: There is no one in this room who can stand against me. Your mothers warned you about my coming. Fear the moment. But you think you could have a chance. But you are afraid. What if I could be the One? This could be the moment you've been praying for, all your life.
author: Paul Atreides

quote: I recognized your footsteps, old man.
author: Paul Atreides

quote: He who can destroy a thing has the real control it.
author: Paul Atreides

quote: This prophecy is how they enslave us.
author: Chani

quote: Beware of the trapdoor spiders. Centipedes are very nasty. Not the big ones, they're harmless. But the little ones, you have to worry about.
author: Stilgar

quote: May thy knife chip and shatter!
author: Jamis, Fremen adage

quote: The power to destroy a thing is the absolute control over it.
author: Paul Atreides

quote: I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain.
author: Bene Gesserit rite, The Litany Against Fear

quote: On Caladan, we ruled with sea and air power. Here, we must scrabble for desert power
author: Duke Leto Atreides

quote: Parry it!
author: Maelle

quote: For those who come after.
author: Gustave

quote: Learn from the ones that came before... And lay the trail, for the ones who come after.
author: Expeditionier mantra

quote: When one falls, we continue.
author: Lune, Expeditionier oath

quote: When one falls. "WHEN" one falls. Not "IF". "WHEN".
author: Lune

quote: If saving you means losing you, then so be it.
author: Renoir

quote: You should never have come. You're only going to make things worse. For everyone.
author: Renoir

quote: You won't yet understand. But this is a kindness, not a cruelty.
author: Renoir

quote: Stay out of this. You chose to walk away. You don't get to come back now and interfere.
author: Renoir

quote: Sometimes we paint the bars of our own prison.
author: Renoir

quote: I envy them, those who can't see. Those who know not, that they are not.
author: Alicia

quote: I used to be an adventurer like you. Then I took an arrow in the knee.
author: Guard

quote: I am sworn to carry your burdens...
author: Lydia

quote: My cousin's out fighting dragons, and what do I get? Guard duty.
author: Guard

quote: Do you get to the Cloud District very often? Oh, what am I saying, of course you don't.
author: Nazeem

quote: Nope. Sorry. Nothing.
author: Courier

quote: By Azura, by Azura, by Azura! It's the grand champion! I can't believe it's you, standing here next to me!
author: Adoring Fan

quote: I don't know you, and I don't care to know to know you
author: Ulrich Leland

quote: You've been a good friend, in the short time that I've known you. But now I must go. The Dragon waits.
author: Martin Septim

quote: You are the one from my dreams.
author: Uriel Septim

quote: I'm not cute. I'm deadly.
author: Darth Nox

quote: I like assassinating assassins. They always look so surprised.
author: Emperor's Wrath

quote: A blind, deaf, comatose lobotomy patient could feel my anger!
author: Darth Baras

quote: Nonsense repeated does not become truth.
author: Arcann

quote: I have waited twenty thousand years, but I will wait no longer.
author: Soa

quote: The future is not a river to carry us. It is the ocean in which we drown, if we are not prepared.
author: Emperor Valkorion

quote: Fear the snake who believes himself a dragon.
author: Emperor Valkorion

quote: Vexx is the galaxy's greatest quick-draw artist. Vexx can shoot your ears off so fast you won't even hear yourself scream.
author: Vexx

quote: Sanity is a prison. Let madness release you.
author: Dread Master Raptus

quote: Do not seak reason. You cannot comprehend
author: Dread Master Raptus

quote: Spin ever downward. Fall. Disappear.
author: Dread Master Raptus

quote: Is this what you call strategy?
author: Dread Master Tyrans

quote: Do not attempt to comprehend my methods.
author: Dread Master Tyrans

quote: As expected, you carelessly breached my inner sanctum.
author: Dread Master Calphayus

quote: Seeds of darkness bloom into nightmares.
author: Dread Master Calphayus

quote: Flesh is insufficient. You must discard it.
author: Dread Master Brontes

quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
author: Uncle Ben Parker

quote: Go web go!
author: Peter Parker

quote: I missed the part where that's my problem.
author: Peter Parker

quote: That's a cute outfit. Did your husband give it to you?
author: Peter Parker

quote: Sorry I'm late. It's a jungle out there. I had to beat an old lady with a stick to get these cranberries.
author: Peter Parker

quote: Pizza time!
author: Peter Parker

quote: I'm back!
author: Peter Parker

quote: You're getting on my nerves!
author: Dr. Otto Octavius

quote: What's "Hi"? Can I spend it?
author: Mr. Ditkovich

quote: If promises were crackers, my daughter would be fat
author: Mr. Ditkovich

quote: Sorry doesn't pay the rent.
author: Mr. Ditkovich

quote: Listen, it's a free country. It's not rent-free country.
author: Mr. Ditkovich

quote: It's no big deal. But if you feel that bad about it, you can buy me pizza some time. Today's good.
author: Mr. Ditkovich

quote: You'll get your rent when you fix this DAMN DOOR!
author: Peter Parker

quote: If you want the shots, I'll take the staff job. Double the money.
author: Peter Parker

quote: I'm gonna put some dirt in your eye!
author: Peter Parker

quote: You want forgiveness? Get religion.
author: Peter Parker

quote: Look at little Goblin Jr. Gonna cry?
author: Peter Parker

quote: Still got the moves.
author: Peter Parker

quote: Never wound what you can't kill.
author: Eddie Brock

quote: I like being bad. It makes me happy.
author: Eddie Brock

quote: Welcome to good burger, home of the good burger. Can I take your order?
author: Ed

quote: Come on, Dora! You're the one with the map. Don't ask me.
author: Crazy Steve

quote: I'm vengeance.
author: Batman

quote: If you're good at something, never do it for free.
author: Joker

quote: No one cared who I was 'til I put on the mask.
author: Bane

quote: Oh, you think darkness is your ally. But you merely adopted the dark; I was born in it, molded by it. I didn’t see the light until I was already a man. And by then, it was nothing to me but blinding.
author: Bane

quote: So you came back to die with your city.
author: Bane

quote: We come here not as conquerors but as liberators, to return control of this city to the people.
author: Bane

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
quote: If I take one more step, it will be the fartherest away from home I've ever been!
author: Sam

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
quote: Throw yourself in next time, and rid us of your stupidity.
author: Gandalf

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
quote: You shall not pass!
author: Gandalf

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
quote: So be it. You shall be the Fellowship of the Ring.
author: Elrond

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
quote: A wizard is never late, nor is he early. He arrives precisely when he means to.
author: Gandalf

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
quote: I would have followed you, my brother... My captain... My king.
author: Boromir

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
quote: One does not simply walk into Mordor.
author: Boromir

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: You'll find more cheer in a graveyard.
author: Gimli

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: Don't tell the elf.
author: Gimli

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: I would stay still, if I were you.
author: Gimli

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: Look to my coming at first light on the fifth day. At dawn, look to the East.
author: Gandalf

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: You would not part an old man from his walking stick.
author: Gandalf

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: The courtesy of your hall is somewhat lessened of late.
author: Gandalf

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: Keep your forked tongue behind your teeth.
author: Gandalf

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: I did not pass through fire and death to bandy crooked words with a witless worm.
author: Gandalf

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: You have no power here, Gandalf the Grey
author: Theodin

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: A red sun rises, blood has been spilled this night.
author: Legolas

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: They're taking the hobbits to Isengard.
author: Legolas

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: No parent should have to bury their child.
author: Theodin

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
quote: Your leechcraft would have had me crawling on all fours like a beast!
author: Theodin

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
quote: Never thought I'd die fighting side by side with an elf.
author: Gimli

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
quote: I can't carry it for you, but I can carry you!
author: Sam

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
quote: A day may come when the courage of Men fails, when we forsake our friends and break all bonds of fellowship, but it is not this day.
author: Aragorn

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
quote: By all that you hold dear on this good earth, I bid you stand, Men of the West!
author: Aragorn

source: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
quote: Spears shall be shaken, shields shall be splintered, a sword-day, a red day, ere the sun rises!
author: Theodin

source: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
quote: I am fire! I am death!
author: Smaug

source: Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menance
quote: At last we will reveal ourselves to the Jedi. At last we will have revenge.
author: Darth Maul

source: Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menance
quote: Now this is podracing!
author: Anakin Skywalker

source: Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menance
quote: This is getting out of hand. Now there are two of them!
author: Viceroy Nute Gunray

source: Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menance
quote: There's always a bigger fish.
author: Qui-Gon Jinn

source: Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menance
quote: The ability to speak does not make you intelligent.
author: Qui-Gon Jinn

source: Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menance
quote: Wipe them out. All of them.
author: Darth Sidious

source: Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menance
quote: I will make it legal.
author: Darth Sidious

source: Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menance
quote: A surprise to be sure, but a welcome one.
author: Senator Palpatine

source: Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menance
quote: We will watch your career with great interest.
author: Chancellor Palpatine

source: Star Wars Episode 2: Attack of the Clones
quote: I love democracy.
author: Chancellor Palpatine

source: Star Wars Episode 2: Attack of the Clones
quote: You call this a diplomatic solution?
author: Anakin Skywalker

source: Star Wars Episode 2: Attack of the Clones
quote: I'm just a simple man trying to make my way in the universe.
author: Jango Fett

source: Star Wars Episode 2: Attack of the Clones
quote: This party's over.
author: Mace Windu

source: Star Wars Episode 2: Attack of the Clones
quote: I've become more powerful than any Jedi. Even you.
author: Count Dooku

source: Star Wars Episode 2: Attack of the Clones
quote: I don't like sand. It's coarse and rough and irritating and it gets everywhere.
author: Anakin Skywalker

source: Star Wars Episode 2: Attack of the Clones
quote: Your clones are very impressive. You must be very proud.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: I'm going to end this, once and for all.
author: Mace Windu

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: So this is how liberty dies... with thunderous applause.
author: Padme Amidala

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: If you're not with me, then you're my enemy!
author: Anakin Skywalker

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: You underestimate my power!
author: Anakin Skywalker

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: I have brought peace, freedom, justice, and security to my new empire.
author: Anakin Skywalker

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: Only a sith deals in absolutes.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: So uncivilized.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: I have the high ground.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: You have done that yourself.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: Sith lords are our speciality.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: There's no war here, unless you've brought it with you
author: Tion Medon

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: Power! Unlimited power!
author: Darth Sidious

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: Execute Order 66.
author: Darth Sidious

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: I am the Senate.
author: Darth Sidious

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: Did you ever hear the tragedy of Darth Plagueis the Wise?
author: Darth Sidious

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: It's not a story the Jedi would tell you.
author: Darth Sidious

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural.
author: Darth Sidious

source: Star Wars Episode 3: The Revenge of the Sith
quote: Ironic. He could save others from death, but not himself.
author: Darth Sidious

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: I got a bad feeling about this.
author: Han Solo

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid.
author: Han Solo

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: Who's the more foolish? The fool or the fool who follows him?
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: I felt a great disturbance in the Force, as if millions of voices suddenly cried out in terror and were suddenly silenced.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: The Force will be with you, always.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: These aren't the droids you're looking for.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: That's no moon.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
author: Darth Vader

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: The Force is strong with this one.
author: Darth Vader

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: Don't be too proud of this technological terror you've constructed. The ability to destroy a planet is insignificant next to the power of the Force.
author: Darth Vader

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: Help Me, Obi-Wan Kenobi, you're my only hope.
author: Princess Leia

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: Aren't you a little short to be a storm trooper?
author: Princess Leia

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: Hello there.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

source: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
quote: What a piece of junk!
author: Luke Skywalker

source: Star Wars Episode 5: The Empire Strikes Back
quote: He's no good to me dead.
author: Boba Fett

source: Star Wars Episode 5: The Empire Strikes Back
quote: I am altering the deal. Pray I don't alter it any further.
author: Darth Vader

source: Star Wars Episode 5: The Empire Strikes Back
quote: Join me, and together we can rule the galaxy as father and son.
author: Darth Vader

source: Star Wars Episode 5: The Empire Strikes Back
quote: Would it help if I got out and pushed?
author: Princess Leia

source: Star Wars Episode 5: The Empire Strikes Back
quote: I don't know where you get your delusions, laser brain.
author: Princess Leia

source: Star Wars Episode 5: The Empire Strikes Back
quote: No ship that small has a cloaking device.
author: Captain Needa

source: Star Wars Episode 5: The Empire Strikes Back
quote: The possibility of successfully navigating an asteroid field is approximately 3,720 to 1!
author: Captain Needa

source: Star Wars Episode 5: The Empire Strikes Back
quote: Never tell me the odds.
author: Han Solo

source: Star Wars Episode 6: The Return of the Jedi
quote: Your overconfidence is your weakness.
author: Luke Skywalker

source: Star Wars Episode 6: The Return of the Jedi
quote: I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
author: Luke Skywalker

source: Star Wars Episode 6: The Return of the Jedi
quote: Many Bothans died to bring us this information.
author: Mon Mothma

source: Star Wars Episode 6: The Return of the Jedi
quote: It's a trap!
author: Admiral Ackbar

source: Star Wars Episode 6: The Return of the Jedi
quote: It's an older code, sir, but it checks out.
author: Admiral Piett

quote: Rogue One? There is no Rogue One!
author: Rebel Flight Dispatcher

quote: I'm one with the Force, and the Force is with me.
author: Chirrut Îmwe

quote: Make ten men feel like a hundred.
author: Cassian Andor

quote: Rebellions are built on hope.
author: Cassian Andor

quote: Congratulations. You are being rescued. Please do not resist.
author: K-2SO

quote: Save the Rebellion! Save the dream!
author: Saw Gerrera

quote: We stand here amidst MY achievement! Not yours!
author: Saw Gerrera

quote: We need a statement, not a manifesto.
author: Saw Gerrera

quote: Be careful not to choke on your aspirations, Director.
author: Darth Vader

source: Star Wars Episode 7: The Force Awakens
quote: That's not how the force works.
author: Han Solo

quote: Ya like jazz?
author: Barry B. Benson

quote: Why is yogurt night so difficult?
author: Ken

quote: What are you talking about? Are there other bugs in you life?
author: Ken

quote: And you'll be happy to know that bees as a species haven't had one day off in 27 million years.
author: Trudy

quote: So you'll just work us to death?
author: Barry B. Benson

quote: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway, because bees don't care what humans think is impossible.
author: Narrator

quote: Tony Stark was able to build this in a CAVE...with a box of SCRAPS!
author: Obadiah Stane

quote: Well, I'm sorry. I'm not Tony Stark.
author: Scientist, William Ginter Riva

quote: I don't know if you know this, but I don't speak Russian!
author: Justin Hammer

quote: You know what keeps going through my head? 'Where's my sandwich?'
author: Tony Stark

quote: You know who likes special entertainment like that? My mom!
author: Muscle Man

quote: My boss found out that I gave you guys that TV, and he fired me.
author: Jimmy

quote: You can't touch music. But music can touch you.
author: Mordecai

quote: In case I don't see ya, good afternoon, good evening, and good night.
author: Truman

quote: Blocked at every turn. Beautifully synchronized, don't you agree
author: Truman

quote: We accept the reality of the world with which we are presented. It's as simple as that.
author: Christof

quote: There's no more truth out there than there is in the world I created for you.
author: Christof

quote: In the face of overwhelming odds, I'm left with only one option. I'm gonna have to science the shit out of this!
author: Mark Watney

quote: Look, I don't mean to sound arrogant or anything... but I am the greatest botanist on this planet.
author: Mark Watney

quote: They say once you grow crops somewhere, you have officially colonized it. So, technically, I colonized Mars.
author: Mark Watney

quote: At some point, everything is going to go south on you. Everything is going to go south and you're going to say, 'This is it. This is how I end.' Now, you can either accept that... or you can get to work.
author: Mark Watney

quote: I'd get to fly around like Iron Man.
author: Mark Watney

quote: I'm gonna be taking a craft over in international waters without permission. Which, by definition, makes me a pirate.
author: Mark Watney

quote: Why be you, when you can be new?
author: Ratchet

quote: Listen... I know it isn't easy, Rodney, but a dream that you don't fight for can haunt you for the rest of your life.
author: Herb Copperbottom

quote: If you can make it here, you can make it anywhere. And if you can't make it here, welcome to the club.
author: Fender

quote: Where do they make dreamers like you? Get lost, freak!
author: Tim the Gate Controller

quote: You know it used to be a lot worse. They had this giant hammer...oh they brought it back.
author: Fender

quote: Making the baby's the fun part.
author: Lydia Copperbottom

quote: Soon as you reach the age where your warranty expires, you start falling apart.
author: Herb Copperbottom

quote: Never try, never fail. Those are the words I live by.
author: Crank

quote: Please, I'm just a desperate guy trying to feed his family.
author: RJ

quote: For humans, enough is never enough.
author: RJ

quote: Why does everyone think I need a man, huh? I look like a nest and smell like a swamp.
author: Stella

quote: That, my friend, is a magical combination of corn flour, dehydrated cheese solids, BHA, BHT and good old MSG, a.k.a., the chip.
author: RJ

quote: We eat to live, these guys live to eat.
author: RJ

quote: Fat-free cookies? Might as well be eating dirt.
author: RJ

quote: The Verminator is on the job.
author: Dwayne LaFontante

quote: Buenos días, reptile.
author: Dwayne LaFontante

quote: You've just been verminated.
author: Dwayne LaFontante

quote: Oh, really? Do you, in fact, have an associates degree from Vermtech?
author: Dwayne LaFontante

quote: Where have you been? I'm throwing a 'Welcome to the Neighborhood' party, and so far Debbie's car has killed more animals than you have.
author: Gladys Sharp

quote: Hey, hey, hey! It's Faaaat Albert!
author: Fat Albert

quote: Whatever we need, the Box provides. The rest is up to us.
author: Alby

quote: Remember... Wicked is good.
author: Dr. Ava Paige

quote: Tonight we are going to rob a bank.
author: Daniel

quote: That's a lot of excitement for a crime.
author: Daniel

quote: You're an idiot if you think they robbed a bank.
author: Thaddeus

quote: My mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're going to get.
author: Forrest Gump

quote: Mama always said there's an awful lot you can tell about a person by their shoes. Where they're going, where they've been.
author: Forrest Gump

quote: Stupid is as stupid does.
author: Forrest Gump

quote: Shrimp is the fruit of the sea. You can barbecue it, boil it, broil it, bake it, sauté it.
author: Bubba Blue

quote: That's all I have to say about that.
author: Forrest Gump

quote: If you ain't first, you're last.
author: Reese Bobby

quote: It's the fastest who get paid; and it's the fastest who get laid.
author: Reese Bobby

quote: I got a better idea. Why don't you boys go dig a hole, and I'll get another beer.
author: Reese Bobby

quote: There ain't nothing more God damn frightening than driving with a live cougar in the car.
author: Reese Bobby

quote: I'm too drunk to taste this chicken.
author: Ricky Bobby

quote: As a sign of humility, if you kiss me on the lips right now, I will return to Paris and you will never see me again in NASCAR.
author: Jean Girard

quote: Shake and bake.
author: Cal Naughton Jr

quote: Why don't you have a poek bun in your hand?
author: Street Food Vendor

quote: A man who never eats pork buns, is never a whole man!
author: Street Food Vendor

quote: The cake is a lie.
author: Doug Rattmann

quote: All right, I've been thinking, when life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade! Make life take the lemons back!
author: Cave Johnson

quote: I don't want your damn lemons! What am I supposed to do with these?
author: Cave Johnson

quote: I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that'll burn your house down!
author: Cave Johnson

quote: Science isn't about "why", it's about "why not". Why is so much of our science dangerous? Why not marry safe science if you love it so much? In fact, why not invent a special safety door that won't hit you in the butt on the way out, because you are fired!
author: Cave Johnson

quote: Oh. Hi. So. How are you holding up? Because I'm a potato.
author: GLaDOS

quote: He's not just a regular moron. He's the product of the greatest minds of a generation working together with the express purpose of building the dumbest moron who ever lived. And you just put him in charge of the entire facility.
author: GLaDOS

quote: It's dangerous to go alone.
author: Old Man

quote: Do a barrel roll!
author: Peppy Hare

quote: War never changes.
author: The Wanderer

quote: Did I ever tell you what the definition of insanity is?
author: Vaas Montenegro

quote: I should go.
author: Commander Shepard

quote: Stay awhile and listen.
author: Deckard Cain

source: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
quote: Why are we still here? Just to suffer?
author: Kazuhira 'Kaz' Miller

quote: All you had to do is follow the damn train, CJ
author: Big Smoke

quote: I'll have two number nines, a number nine large, a number six with extra dip, a number seven, two number forty-fives, one with cheese, and a large soda.
author: Big Smoke

quote: You forget a thousand things every day, pal. Make sure this is one of 'em.
author: Michael De Santa

quote: I'm tired of this, Grandpa!
author: Warden Louise Walker

quote: Well that's too damn bad! You keep digging.
author: Charles 'Trout' Walker

quote: I ain't gonna kill you, but by the time I'm finished with you, you gonna wish you was dead!
author: Charles 'Trout' Walker

quote: I Can Do This All Day
author: Steve Rogers

quote: He may have been your father, boy, but he wasn't your daddy.
author: Yondu

quote: Here's Johnny!
author: Jack Torrance

quote: Say hello to my little friend!
author: Tony Montana

quote: You can't handle the truth!
author: Colonel Nathan Jessup

quote: To infinity and beyond!
author: Buzz Lightyear

quote: There's a snake in my boot.
author: Woody

quote: I'll kidnap a thousand children before I let this company die!
author: Henry J. Waternoose

quote: Put that thing back where it came from, or so help me!
author: Mike Wazowski

quote: Live long and prosper.
author: Spock

quote: That's what she said.
author: Michael Scott

quote: Whenever I'm about to do something, I think, 'Would an idiot do that?', and if they would, I do not do that thing.
author: Dwight Schrute

quote: I'll be back.
author: The Terminator

quote: Come with me if you want to live.
author: Kyle Reese

quote: Hasta la vista, baby.
author: The Terminator

quote: Go ahead, make my day.
author: Detective Harry Callahan

quote: Why did it have to be snakes?
author: Indiana Jones

source: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
quote: That belongs in a museum!
author: Indiana Jones

quote: I have come here to chew bubblegum and kick ass, and I'm all out of bubblegum.
author: John Nada

quote: I'm the king of the world
author: Jack Dawson

quote: Houston, we have a problem.
author: Jim Lovell

quote: If you build it, he will come.
author: Disembodied Voice

source: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
quote: Badges? We ain't got no badges! We don't need no badges! I don't have to show you any stinking badges!
author: Gold Hat

quote: Oh, no, it wasn't the airplanes. It was Beauty killed the Beast.
author: Carl Denham

quote: You're gonna need a bigger boat.
author: Martin Brody

quote: I'm walking here! I'm walking here!
author: Ratso Rizzo

quote: There's no place like home.
author: Dorothy

source: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
quote: You're a wizard, Harry!
author: Rubeus Hagrid

quote: I see this as an absolute win!
author: Bruce Banner

source: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
quote: You are without doubt the worst pirate I've ever heard of!
author: Commodore James Norrington

quote: My name is Inigo Montoya, you killed my father, prepare to die.
author: Inigo Montoya

quote: You keep using that word. I do not think it means what you think it means.
author: Inigo Montoya

quote: Look at me! I'm the captain now
author: Muse

quote: Get off my plane!
author: President James Marshall

quote: Are you not entertained?
author: Maximus Decimus Meridius

quote: I want to play a game.
author: Jigsaw

quote: Power and perfection are overrated. I think you are wise to choose happiness and love.
author: Iroh

quote: What you've just said is one of the most insanely idiotic things I have ever heard. At no point in your rambling, incoherent response were you even close to anything that could be considered a rational thought. Everyone in this room is now dumber for having listened to it. I award you no points, and may God have mercy on your soul.
author: Principal Max Anderson

quote: How'd it get burned!
author: Edward Malus
